modName: Named Bosses In Skyrim II Renewal
summary:
Added new very strong and bigger boss monsters in skyrim.
<br />
<br />Test your limits with Named bosses in Skyrim Beta II
<br />
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]
Lich's Location is secret. :)

[color=#ff0000][b]※Mentor, Ghoul lord and Henosig will be updated [/b][/color]


[color=#ff0000][b]※Warnning※[/b][/color]
After delete the old version, install new version


Updated the Named Bosses In Skyrim Beta version.
Renewal version is better than old version



1.White knight and Black knight is very powerful knights. They will accomplish their mission for Mentor.
2.White sorceress and Black sorceress is very powerful wizard. They will accomplish their mission for Mentor.
3. Baphomet is goats friend. Don't touch the goats.
4. Many wizards find the Lich's Tomb for Lich's magic book. but nobody find it.
5.Skull Trio are Lich's subordinate.
6.White sorceress learned powerful knowledge by Lich's book.





1.0v


Magic
Change the Destruction Spear's appearance.
Earthquake is added
Call Lightning is added.
Meteor Strike is added.


BOSS
Added the special skill for Death Knight. Adjust damege and defence of Death Knight.
Added the special skill for White Knight. Adjust damege and defence of WhiteKnight.
Adjust damege and defence of Black Knight. two handed Black Knight is added.
Added the special skill and item for Baphomet. Adjust damege and defence of Baphomet.
Adjust damege and defence of Skull Trio. Change the Skull Trio's location.
Added the  powerful skill and item for Lich. Adjust damege and defence of Lich.
Added the White & black soceress.
Lich's tomb is not indicated on the map.


ITEM
Added Baphomet's staff.
If you want powerful sword, read next recipe.
Powerless sword + Magic book.


-------------------------------------------------------------
1.001v

ITEM
Fixed an issue of White sorceress's robe.


Feedback please. [/size][url=mailto:Voiceofheaven90@gmail.com][size=3]Voiceofheaven90@gmail.com[/size][/url][size=3]

@ MOONSUGAR PRESENT.[/size]
